title: Using meta-features to improve model
description: General informationThis kernel is a continuation of my previous kernels:  EDA feature engineering  In this kernel I'll try to use additional data, which is provided only for train dataset. We have several files with additional features, which have information only for train and not for test. In this kernel I'll show how to create meta-features both train and test and use them.
